original_text: And a proclamation was made throughout Judah and Jerusalem to all the returned exiles that they should assemble at Jerusalem,
korean_text: 유다와 예루살렘에 사로잡혔던 자들의 자손들에게 공포하기를 너희는 예루살렘으로 모이라

sentences.original_text: And a proclamation was made throughout Judah and Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 포고가 유다와 예루살렘 온 땅에 선포되었으니

sentences.original_text: that they should assemble at Jerusalem
